subject: Plus X pedals
description_text:
Hi, 

I have some questions about my pedals which arrived yesterday.
When fully set up I am getting huge amounts of interference when I turn my wheel the throttle input goes up and down.
Also when I hit the brake in IRacing it bounces up and down and makes it impossible to use.

Why is this happening?

Regards,
James David Brocklehurst

conversations.body_text: Hi James Brocklehurst,   If this occurs, it indicates that your PCâ€™s grounding may be unreliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used in a grounded wall outlet. You can refer to the post below and connect the three metal screws on the PC case, control box, and pedals, which should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
